human.Name: human
human.Description: Humans are versatile and ambitious, known for their adaptability and resilience.

elf.Name: elf
elf.Description: Elves are graceful and wise, often possessing a deep connection to nature and magic.

dwarf.Name: dwarf
dwarf.Description: Dwarves are sturdy and hardworking, renowned for their craftsmanship and loyalty.

orc.Name: orc
orc.Description: Orcs are fierce and strong, often living in tribal societies and valuing honor in battle.

gnome.Name: gnome
gnome.Description: Gnomes are inventive and curious, known for their cleverness and affinity for technology and magic.
